com.db.chart.view

Class XController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.view.AxisController
      • com.db.chart.view.XController

  • public class XController
extends AxisController
    Class responsible to control horizontal measures, positions, yadda yadda. If the drawing is requested it will also take care of it.
